snippet: The former mayor’s burial site is classic Edward I. Koch: he rejected a Jewish cemetery for Trinity Church Cemetery, an Episcopal site open to all.
abstract: Final resting place of former New York City mayor Edward I Koch is Trinity Church Cemetery, Episcopal site in Washington Heights; Koch rejected a Jewish cemetery in favor of one in his beloved home borough of Manhattan; choice reflects Koch's style, contradictory and iconoclastic, and proudly Jewish on his own terms.
lead_paragraph: The former mayor’s burial site is classic Edward I. Koch: he rejected a Jewish cemetery for Trinity Church Cemetery, an Episcopal site open to all.

headline.seo: Koch Was Proudly Jewish, but on His Own Terms
headline.main: Services to Reflect Koch: Proudly Jewish on His Own Terms
headline.print_headline: Services to Reflect Koch: Proudly Jewish on His Own Terms
